item.title: Azure DevOps Web App CI/CD
item.description: React Web App Release: Startup command 1pm2 serve /home/site/wwwroot/ --no-daemon --spa References https://git-scm.com/docs/git-mv https://www.runoob.com/git/git-mv.html

item.title: CI/CD Command Line Tools
item.description: iOS xcodebuild archive and export ipa 1wsPath="./Failed/MyTestApp/MyTestApp.xcodeproj/project.xcworkspace" 2acPath="./Failed/MyTestApp/app.xcarchive" 3epPath="./Failed/MyTestApp/output/build/export/_XcodeTaskExport_MyTestApp" 4epoPlistPath="ExportOptions00.plist" 5unzipPayload="./Failed/MyTestApp/output/unzip/" 6 7rm -r $acPath 8rm -r $epPath 9rm -r $unzipPayload 10 11xcodebuild -workspace $wsPath -scheme MyTestApp clean CODE_SIGN_STYLE=Manual 12xcodebuild -workspace $wsPath -scheme MyTestApp archive -archivePath $acPath CODE_SIGN_STYLE=Manual 13xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath $acPath -exportPath $epPath -exportOptionsPlist $epoPlistPath 14 15unzip $epPath/MyTestApp.ipa -d $unzipPayload 16codesign -dv $unzipPayload/Payload/MyTestApp.app 17 18/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Print CFBundleVersion' [Info.plist] 19/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Print CFBundleIdentifier' [Info.plist] 20/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Print' [Info.plist] 21 22https://medium.
